name: Yohoho.io
description: Play as a pirate on various themed islands! Open chests and collect doubloons to get bigger. Kill other players to collect their coins, get bigger again! Use your special dash ability to boost your speed and overcome your opponents.

name: Poly Track
description: A fast-paced, low-poly driving game with loops, jumps, and high-speed action, inspired by TrackMania.

name: Geometry Dash
description: Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer! Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

name: Drive Mad
description: Drive Mad is an arcade driving game with challenging obstacles and stunts. Navigate tricky courses with precise control for a thrilling experience.
Join the tiles and reach 2048! Experience this popular and addictive puzzle game. Slide the tiles to combine them and create larger numbers. Can you reach the elusive 2048 tile?

name: Among Us
description: Among Us is a free space-themed online game where up to 15 players play together and are assigned the roles of 'Crewmate' or 'Imposter'. The aim of the game is for the crewmates to identify the players who are the imposters before the imposters can secretly sabotage their tasks and individually kill the crewmates.

name: Angry Sharks
description: Become the ultimate predator in this offline shark game where you'll rule the ocean and eat your way through an underwater world of adventure.

name: Awesome Tanks
description: Smash enemy tanks, destroy bosses, find secret rooms full of bonuses. Create your own levels in Level Editor and share them with the world. Collect coins to upgrade your tank's stats, purchase and improve weapons. Earn multiple achievements.

name: Ballistic Chicken
description: Ballistic Chicken is a quirky and fun physics-based game where you launch chickens out of a cannon and try to get them to fly as far as possible.

name: Basketball Random
description: Basket Random is an entertaining and quirky basketball game known for its unpredictable physics and random gameplay elements.

name: Basketball Bros
description: A fast-paced, one-on-one basketball game featuring a variety of playable characters, each with unique skills and moves.

name: Bitlife
description: A text-based life simulation game that allows players to make choices and experience a virtual life.

name: Ragdoll Hit
description: An action-packed adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Equip your hero, choose your weapons, and dive into the fun physics-based gameplay that makes every fight an epic showdown.

name: Breakoid
description: Players control a paddle that bounces a ball to destroy bricks in a level, progressing through various stages.

name: BreakTheBank (Henry Stickman)
description: Help Henry Stickmin break into a bank that's situated in the middle of a desert. Choose one of the risky decisions and watch as the rest of the story unfolds.

name: Cannonbasket4
description: Get the ball into the basket to complete the level. Use your mouse to aim and shoot the cannon. Move your mouse further from the cannon to make a more powerful shot.

name: Champion Island
description: Compete in a variety of sports challenges in a charming island setting filled with mini-games, challenges, and secrets.

name: Territorial.io
description: Expand your territory and dominate the map in this strategic multiplayer game.

name: Creative Kill Chamber
description: Use creative methods to eliminate enemies and escape each level in this point-and-click action game.

name: Minecraft
description: Explore, build, and survive in this iconic sandbox game. Play online through a hosted client.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: Explore, build, and survive in this iconic sandbox game. Play online through a hosted client.
